ygData.subject: Re: Vampiric embrace or lifetap?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is one of the spells I actually like.  As a DE, my Dex is high enough to proc it sometimes 5 times in a long fight, at 16 damage a pop = 80
ygData.messageBody:
Brian Hook wrote:
>
> From: "Brian Hook" <bhook@...>
>
> Let me ask this -- if Vampiric Embrace was replaced with a Lifetap, would that be considered an improvement?
>
> Brian
>

This is one of the spells I actually like. As a DE, my Dex is high
enough to proc it sometimes 5 times in a long fight, at 16 damage
a pop = 80 damage/heal if I switch to my one hand. I've done it
6 or 7 before with dex buff and quicknesss on. I don't know how
effective the different lifetaps are, but it almost seems that vamp
embrace was meant for us, since it requires melee.

Does anyone play a necro and know the damage/heal for each of the
lifetap line?

Xilith T'Vyn
http://www.soerbaird.com/shadowknight
